name: Burg Battle
descr:
Burg Battle is a reverse tower defense game. Build custom bases, strategically counter your enemies, and push to destroy their castle.

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1447420/extras/buildingdestroy.gif?t=1664892128[/img][h2]Features[/h2][list][li] Play online with your friends or offline with bots.
[/li][li] Two game modes: traditional tug of war and horde.
[/li][li] A deep progression system where you can customize for your playstyle.
[/li][li] Two unique races to play, each with their own units, abilities, and talent trees.[/li][/list]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1447420/extras/Talents.gif?t=1664892128[/img]
